posts.post_content:
I am open to requests for singles and custom lots. 

Individual prices are included in the checklist, linked below. 

Shipping is included. 

A breakdown of the collection is below. I have listed each series along with how many cards at last count I had. This list contains no duplicates.

Series 1 - 30 cards (21 graded / 9 raw) $2,200
Series 2 - 86 cards (58 graded / 28 raw and is complete except for Levy) SOLD
Series 3 - 85 cards (29 graded / 56 raw and no orange borders are in the collection) $4,900
Series 4 - 9 cards (1 graded / 8 raw) $750
Series 5 - 14 cards (10 graded / 4 raw) SOLD
Series 6 - 14 cards (8 graded / 6 raw) $1,200
Series 7 - 14 cards (8 graded / 6 raw) $1,300
Series 8 - 8 cards (1 graded / 7 raw and I do have the T210-8 Foster listed in a separate FS post and for now, is not included in this number) $1,000

A checklist of the cards in the collection can be found here:
[URL="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I1sGEt0rnGyr0gZKegAUxbHL-1HGJZRDciVV6mII5LY/edit?usp=sharing"]T210 Set Checklist[/URL]

A gallery of the cards in the collection can be found here at the following link. The images are in order by series, with raw cards first in alphabetical order and followed by the graded cards in alphabetical order.
[URL="https://flic.kr/s/aHBqjCbPVh"]T210 Collection Gallery[/URL]

Please PM if you have interest in any of the Series lots at this time and we can discuss. Should I decide to move to custom lot offerings then I will update my post here again.
I have added a link to the OP for a scanned gallery of the collection.
Bump with some additional information in the main post.
Bump, I have moved to offering each Series as a lot for sale. Please PM me if you are interested in any of the Series lots.
Bump, updated and added prices to each series lot.

Great cards Mark. 

If the person who bought the Series 2 cards is selling I would be interested in the Jackson, Lynchburg card.

I'm trying to collect all of the Jacksonville & Savannah players + Viola from this set. The only ones I already have that you have is Pope and Howard. I would be interested in a Viola, Reynolds, Martina & Magoon lot if you could do that?
Bumping, single cards are now priced in the checklist linked in the original post.
